description:
Join the fastest growing dealership in the area! We offer excellent pay, benefits and top training. No car sales experience needed. Work in the beautiful northern Minnesota lakes area, moments from the water and forests, with excellent healthcare, schools and a first class state university. Affordable housing and a relaxed lifestyle. If you love the outdoors this is the place to be.

We have a new facility with a growing customer base. There is plenty of opportunity with our large new and previously owned multi-line inventory to sell from.

The ideal candidate must have a strong desire to succeed. Our Sales Consultants come from a variety of backgrounds and industries. You should have experience or education providing exceptional customer service and previous sales experience is a plus but not required. We will train you. Paid training with ongoing training provided. Your success is our commitment.

We offer a competitive Compensation Package that is profitable for you and your family, as well as an unparalleled benefits package.

We are open Monday-Friday 8am-6pm and Saturday 8am-5pm. No nights and a 5 day work week. We are closed all major holidays including Memorial Day, Labor Day and 4th of July.

Bemidji Chrysler/Honda of Bemidji is not car sales as usual. We have a fantastic atmosphere and working environment.

If you are looking for a rewarding career, apply today!
